llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: What services are offered? Manicure & Pedicure: ● Traditional Manicure: $30 – $35 ● Traditional Pedicure: $40 ● Shellac Manicure: $40 ● Shellac + Normal Pedicure: $80 ● Removal of Gel/Shellac: $10 ● Repairs (Powder-based overlays): Available ● Press-On Nails: Available Hair Services: ● Braids (Trenzas): $50 ○ Availability depends on hair length, especially in the front.

What services are offered? Manicure & Pedicure: ● Traditional Manicure: $30 – $35 ● Traditional Pedicure: $40 ● Shellac Manicure: $40 ● Shellac + Normal Pedicure: $80 ● Removal of Gel/Shellac: $10 Hair Services: ● Braids (Trenzas): $50
Notes: ● Polygel is not offered ● Custom nail designs can be sent in advance as images
Do you offer mobile services? Yes. ● Mobile service: Client address is required first. ● In-store service: Address is 9 Dryburgh Street, West Melbourne, Apt 111.
